meanings.definition: To arrange or deal with in order of importance
meanings.sent1: She is prioritizing her homework before watching TV.
meanings.sent2: I always start my day by prioritizing my tasks.
meanings.sent3: The cat seems to be prioritizing which toy to play with first.
meanings.sent4: Prioritizing your goals is like putting the most important ones at the top of a ladder.
meanings.sent5: Prioritizing is like creating a roadmap for your day, ensuring you focus on what matters most.

meanings.definition: To determine the order for dealing with (tasks or items) by assigning a priority
meanings.sent1: He is prioritizing the urgent emails first.
meanings.sent2: When planning an event, prioritizing tasks is crucial.
meanings.sent3: The robot is prioritizing its tasks like a diligent worker.
meanings.sent4: Prioritizing tasks is like being a traffic controller for your to-do list.
meanings.sent5: She excels at prioritizing, always knowing what needs to be done first.
